Here is the list of zodiac signs with their respective scores and descriptions:
1. Aries - 7/10 - Adventurous and impulsive, but sometimes reckless.
2. Taurus - 8.5/10 - Practical and reliable, but can be stubborn at times.
3. Gemini - 9/10 - Communicative and adaptable, but prone to mood swings.
4. Cancer - 6.5/10 - Emotional and nurturing, but overly sensitive at times.
5. Leo - 8/10 - Confident and charismatic, but can be prideful and domineering.
6. Virgo - 9.5/10 - Analytical and hardworking, but perfectionistic and critical.
7. Libra - 8/10 - Diplomatic and social, but indecisive at times.
8. Scorpio - 8.5/10 - Passionate and intense, but can be overly aggressive or secretive.
9. Sagittarius - 9/10 - Adventurous and optimistic, but reckless and impatient at times.
10. Capricorn - 7.5/10 - Disciplined and responsible, but can be too focused on work and seriousness.
11. Aquarius - 8.5/10 - Humanitarian and independent, but unconventional and rebellious at times.
12. Pisces - 6/10 - Empathetic and imaginative, but overly sensitive and easily influenced at times.
Note: The scores are subjective and based on general traits associated with each sign.
